structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Web site to provide public access to expenditure records of regional wastewater commission -- Monthly updates -- Registration with Department for Local Government -- Application of KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

text.section: By January 1, 2012, the commissioners of a regional wastewater commission established under the provisions of KRS 65.8901 to 65.8923 shall provide public access to records relating to expenditures of the commission through display of the records on a Web site.
Information on the Web site shall be updated at least on a monthly basis and shall be maintained on the Web site for at least three (3) years.

section.section: The regional wastewater commission shall register with the Department for Local Government as required by KRS 65A.090.

For fiscal periods beginning on and after July 1, 2014, the provisions of KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090 shall apply to regional wastewater commissions. Commissioners shall work with the Department for Local Government to provide the information required by this section through the registry established by KRS 65A.020.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 24, effective March 21, 2013. -- Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch.98, sec.14, effective June 8, 2011.
